category.name: Solution-Specific.Mechatronics
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: SIG_pvariable_rules
preference.preference_description: Defines which Teamcenter types can be associated with the signal as a process variable. If this preference is not set, users can associate a signal to any Teamcenter object that can participate in a relation. Valid Values: Accepts multiple strings as values. Each string must be a valid Teamcenter type corresponding to the secondary object for the desired association. For example, to restrict valid process variables for a signal or subtype to ProcessVariable and its subtypes, set the values as: Signal:ProcessVariable
